questions.question_text: Which of the following is a benefit of using an AWS managed service?

choices.D: Removal of the need to follow compliance standards
choices.B: Increased fixed costs that can be predicted by a finance team
choices.C: Removal of the need to have a backup strategy
choices.A: Reduced operational overhead for a company's IT staff

discussion.content:
Answer is A
Using an AWS managed service reduces the operational overhead for a company’s IT staff by offloading the responsibilities of managing and maintaining the underlying infrastructure and services to AWS, allowing the company to focus on its core business rather than managing the underlying infrastructure. This can also lead to faster time-to-market for new products and services.

Selected Answer: A
A is answer

Selected Answer: A
Vote for A

Selected Answer: A
A is answer

Selected Answer: A
AWS Managed Services (AMS) helps you adopt AWS at scale and operate more efficiently and securely. We leverage standard AWS services and offer guidance and execution of operational best practices with specialized automations, skills, and experience that are contextual to your environment and applications. AMS provides proactive, preventative, and detective capabilities that raise the operational bar and help reduce risk without constraining agility, allowing you to focus on innovation. AMS extends your team with operational capabilities including monitoring, incident detection and management, security, patch, backup, and cost optimization.

Selected Answer: A
A is correct
A should be the correct choice
A would be the correct choice

questions.question_text:
A company that has multiple AWS accounts wants to reduce its recurring cloud costs. The company is using AWS Organizations.

Which AWS tool or feature will share volume pricing discounts and Savings Plans among accounts?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
By using consolidated billing, companies can centralize their AWS spend and take advantage of cost-saving opportunities such as volume pricing discounts and Savings Plans.

Selected Answer: B
Consolidated billing is a popular choice for agencies, resellers, and large advertisers who work with multiple Google Ads accounts and want to streamline their billing by receiving just one monthly invoice. This feature also allows you the convenience of being able to move accounts to monthly invoicing, and from one invoice to another, without having to contact us. This article will show you how to find out whether you qualify to use consolidated billing, and how it works.
B its correct

discussion.content: Appstream is not listed on the exam guide. I see a lot of questions that are using services that are not on the exam guide. Are they even relevant?

Selected Answer: B
Correct Answer:
 • B. Amazon AppStream 2.0
Explanation:
Amazon AppStream 2.0 is a fully managed application streaming service that allows you to securely stream desktop applications to users. With AppStream 2.0, users can access applications from any device without needing to install them locally. This is the best option for securely providing access to desktop applications running in a fully managed environment.

Selected Answer: B
Appstream .2.0

Selected Answer: B
Amazon AppStream 2.0

Selected Answer: B
App stream is used for serverless streaming
Correct answer is B. AppStream 2.0

Selected Answer: B
B. Amazon AppStream 2.0

"As an application streaming / SaaS conversion service, AppStream 2.0 lets you move your desktop applications to AWS without rewriting them. It’s easy to install your applications on AppStream 2.0, set launch configurations, and make your applications available to users. "

https://aws.amazon.com/appstream2/faqs/?nc=sn&loc=7

Selected Answer: B
Amazon AppStream 2.0 is a fully managed application streaming service that allows users to securely stream desktop applications from the AWS Cloud to any device with an internet connection. With AppStream 2.0, applications run on AWS infrastructure, and users can access them remotely through streaming protocols.

AppStream 2.0 provides a secure and controlled environment for running desktop applications by ensuring that the application code and data never leave the AWS infrastructure. Users can access the applications through a web browser or client application on their device, and all processing happens on the AWS servers, with only the user interface being streamed to the device.
Appstream

Selected Answer: B
B. Amazon AppStream 2.0

Shoud be : AWS WorkSpace .. (not in option) .. defo not s3
To provide secure access to desktop applications running in a managed environment on AWS, the company should use Amazon WorkSpaces.

Amazon WorkSpaces is a fully managed desktop computing service in the cloud that allows users to access their desktop applications from anywhere, using any device. It provides a secure and scalable solution for desktop virtualization, enabling organizations to easily provision and manage desktops for their users, without having to invest in expensive hardware and infrastructure.

Amazon WorkSpaces provides a range of features for secure access, including multi-factor authentication, network isolation, encryption, and integration with Active Directory. With Amazon WorkSpaces, the company can provide its users with a secure, high-performance desktop experience, while also reducing the cost and complexity of managing desktop infrastructure.

Selected Answer: B
D. AWS Outposts

AWS Outposts is the service that meets the company's requirement of migrating the workload to AWS while minimizing latency and maintaining the performance of the application. AWS Outposts is a fully managed service that allows you to run AWS infrastructure and services on-premises, in your own data center, or at the edge of your network. It is designed to be used in environments where low-latency, high-throughput, or high-bandwidth applications are critical, and where internet connectivity is limited or unreliable.

Selected Answer: B
B is the answer.

questions.question_text:
A company wants to use the AWS Cloud to provide secure access to desktop applications that are running in a fully managed environment.
Which AWS service should the company use to meet this requirement?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Consolidated billing

"You can use the consolidated billing feature in AWS Organizations to consolidate billing and payment for multiple AWS accounts or multiple Amazon Web Services India Private Limited (AWS India) accounts. Every organization in AWS Organizations has a management account that pays the charges of all the member accounts."

https://docs.aws.amazon.com/awsaccountbilling/latest/aboutv2/consolidated-billing.html

Selected Answer: B
@ExamTopics admins please avoid editing duplicate questions
again, duplicate question

Selected Answer: B
Consolidated billing is a popular choice for agencies, resellers, and large advertisers who work with multiple Google Ads accounts and want to streamline their billing by receiving just one monthly invoice. This feature also allows you the convenience of being able to move accounts to monthly invoicing, and from one invoice to another, without having to contact us. This article will show you how to find out whether you qualify to use consolidated billing, and how it works.

questions.question_text:
A company that has multiple AWS accounts wants to reduce its recurring cloud costs. The company is using AWS Organizations.

Which AWS tool or feature will share volume pricing discounts and Savings Plans among accounts?
What does the concept of agility mean in AWS Cloud computing? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
A. The speed at which AWS resources are implemented
C. The ability to experiment quickly 

"Increase speed and agility – In a cloud computing environment, new IT resources are only a click away, which means that you reduce the time to make those resources available to your developers from weeks to just minutes. This results in a dramatic increase in agility for the organization, since the cost and time it takes to experiment and develop is significantly lower."

https://docs.aws.amazon.com/whitepapers/latest/aws-overview/six-advantages-of-cloud-computing.html

Selected Answer: AC
A. The speed at which AWS resources are implemented
C. The ability to experiment quickly

The concept of agility in AWS Cloud computing refers to the ability to quickly and easily deploy and manage resources on the AWS platform. This includes the speed at which AWS resources are implemented and the ability to experiment quickly with new services and features.

Selected Answer: AC
vote for A and C
vote for A and C

Selected Answer: AC
I agree. A & C
I agree. A & C

Selected Answer: AC
A&C would be correct
A&C would be correct
